title: Fmr. Netflix Exec Reacts to 4Q Results, Content Strategy
description: Simon Gallagher, SPG Global managing director and former strategy and content acquisition executive at Hulu and Netflix, says unlike YouTube, Netflix needs to focus on premium scripted and unscripted content rather than user generated programming. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
